title: PaperPlane
description: Node.js+Socket.io link sharing application for sharing links and files in the classroom.

title: OnetoOne
description: Combination inventory and ticket system for my school's 1:1 laptop program.

title: MusicBox
description: Node.js powered multiuser jukebox. Allows for jukebox-style control over a shared music source via HTTP.

title: CareerDaySorting
description: Integrated signup + scheduling system for my school's career day.

title: Aztec
description: An extendable HTTP server written in Java. Also bundled as a library for imbedding into applications.

title: 2dEnginev2
description: My improved engine for rendering 2D games. Improved from v1, this verion has support for sprites, particle effects, and an improved API for managing objects in a scene.

title: Pong
description: My first OpenGL game. Featured rectangles, circles, and multiplayer

title: 2dEngine
description: My old engine for rendering 2D games. Features included drawing shapes and gravity!

title: Unofficial FRC FMS
description: A reimplementaion of the FIRST Robotics Competition Field Management System protocol in Java

title: PowerBot
description: Modular PHP IRC bot. This project was my first endevour into sockets, as well as my first project with a large codebase.
